comments.author: Linda
comments.body: It was foggy on Sunshine but worse than clouds was the absence of frenz...sorry I missed you! I'll call first next time.

comments.author: Mark Knowles
comments.body: Sorry I missed you on Flag, Steve. But I wasn't much good at all today anyway after a long hiatus. Westminster had some very cool bolts of lightning and some awesome thunder, but no tree damage whatsoever. That's the result of some prescient city planning - there are no trees in Westminster.
